info.author: Kenneth Holstein kjholste@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The DetectorTester component allows users to run a detector on a DataShop dataset and view its output.
Detector Plugin Github
***Permission from DataShop is needed to use this component. Please contact datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu if you would like to request access to this component.
info.inputs:
tab-delimited - A DataShop transaction file
file - A JavaScript detector file
